name: Farmers & Merchants Bancorp, Inc.
description: Farmers & Merchants Bancorp, Inc. is a community bank holding company headquartered in Long Beach, California. Founded in 1907, the bank has a rich history of serving the financial needs of its local communities while providing a wide range of banking services. Farmers & Merchants Bank (F&M Bank), the company’s principal subsidiary, offers various financial products, including personal banking, business banking, and mortgage services. The bank prides itself on its commitment to customer service, personalized banking experiences, and fostering long-term relationships with its clients. F&M Bank is recognized for its strong financial position and operational efficiency, consistently achieving high ratings from independent bank rating agencies. The bank has a network of branches strategically located throughout Southern California, allowing it to cater to a diverse customer base, including individuals, families, and businesses. Farmers & Merchants Bancorp is dedicated to community involvement, actively participating in charitable activities and local initiatives that promote economic growth and development. With a focus on innovation, the company continues to enhance its digital banking capabilities, ensuring that customers have access to modern banking tools while maintaining the personal touch that has defined its service for over a century.

seo.meta_title: Farmers & Merchants Bancorp, Inc. | Community Banking Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Farmers & Merchants Bancorp, Inc., providing community banking services in Southern California. Discover personal and business banking solutions.

faq.answer: Farmers & Merchants Bank offers personal banking, business banking, and mortgage services.

faq.answer: Daniel A. McRae is the CEO of Farmers & Merchants Bancorp, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Farmers & Merchants Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Farmers & Merchants Bank is headquartered in Long Beach, California, USA.

faq.question: When was Farmers & Merchants Bank founded?
faq.answer: Farmers & Merchants Bank was founded in 1907.
